meeting_info.location: Council Chambers, 6th Floor, City Hall, Dallas, Texas; also available via videoconference

presenters: Eddie Garcia, Chief of Police, Dallas Police Department
Dr. Chantal Fahmy, University of Texas at San Antonio UTSA
Pollyanna Ashford, Major of Police, Dallas Police Department
Delridge Williams, Assistant Chief, Dallas Fire Rescue Department
Cassandra Wallace, Manager, Community Preparedness, Outreach & Recovery, Office of Emergency Management & Crisis Response
Dominique Artis, Chief of Public Safety (I), City Manager’s Office
Justin Ball, Chief of Fire (I), Dallas Fire Rescue Department
David Pughes, City Marshal, Dallas Marshal’s Office

financial_items.description: Authorize a five-year service contract for a property room evidence management system for the Police Department
Authorize a three-year service contract for the purchase of gunshot detection equipment and services for the Police Department
Authorize payments to Dallas County for processing and maintaining City prisoners at the Lew Sterrett Criminal Justice Center
Authorize the application for and acceptance of a grant from the National Highway Traffic Safety Administration for the Selective Traffic Enforcement Program
Authorize a three-year sole source services agreement for an online community member incident reporting portal and management system
Authorize a five-year service contract for preventative maintenance and repair agreement for gate, gate operators, and card readers for the Police Department
